remarks: Lemma for meet properties.  (Contributed by NM, 16-Sep-2011.)  (Revised by NM, 12-Sep-2018.)
statement:
meetval2.b $e |- B = ( Base ` K ) $.
meetval2.l $e |- .<_ = ( le ` K ) $.
meetval2.m $e |- ./\ = ( meet ` K ) $.
meetval2.k $e |- ( ph -> K e. V ) $.
meetval2.x $e |- ( ph -> X e. B ) $.
meetval2.y $e |- ( ph -> Y e. B ) $.
meetlem.e $e |- ( ph -> <. X , Y >. e. dom ./\ ) $.
meetlem $p |- ( ph -> ( ( ( X ./\ Y ) .<_ X /\ ( X ./\ Y ) .<_ Y ) /\ A. z e. B ( ( z .<_ X /\ z .<_ Y ) -> z .<_ ( X ./\ Y ) ) ) ) $.
$d ./\ z $.
$d B z $.
$d K z $.
$d X z $.
$d Y z $.
